<!--StartFragment-->

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><strong><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#AB1942">前言</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">查找和排序算法是算法的入门知识，其经典思想可以用于很多算法当中。因为其实现代码较短，应用较常见。所以在面试中经常会问到排序算法及其相关的问题。但万变不离其宗，只要熟悉了思想，灵活运用也不是难事。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">一般在面试中最常考的是快速排序和归并排序，并且经常有面试官要求现场写出这两种排序的代码。对这两种排序的代码一定要信手拈来才行。还有插入排序、冒泡排序、堆排序、基数排序、桶排序等。面试官对于这些排序可能会要求比较各自的优劣、各种算法的思想及其使用场景。还有要会分析算法的时间和空间复杂度。通常查找和排序算法的考察是面试的开始，如果这些问题回答不好，估计面试官都没有继续面试下去的兴趣都没了。所以想开个好头就要把常见的排序算法思想及其特点要熟练掌握，有必要时要熟练写出代码。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">接下来我们就分析一下常见的排序算法及其使用场景。限于篇幅，某些算法的详细演示和图示请自行寻找详细的参考。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><strong><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#AB1942">冒泡排序</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">冒泡排序是最简单的排序之一了，其大体思想就是通过与相邻元素的比较和交换来把小的数交换到最前面。这个过程类似于水泡向上升一样，因此而得名。举个栗子，对</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">5,3,8,6,4</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">这个无序序列进行冒泡排序。首先从后向前冒泡，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">4</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">6</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">比较，把</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">4</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">交换到前面，序列变成</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">5,3,8,4,6</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。同理</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">4</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">8</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">交换，变成</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">5,3,4,8,6,3</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">4</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">无需交换。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">5</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">这样一次冒泡就完了，把最小的数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">3</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">排到最前面了。对剩下的序列依次冒泡就会得到一个有序序列。冒泡排序的时间复杂度为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">O(n^2)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;

minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><strong><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#AB1942">选择排序</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">选择排序的思想其实和冒泡排序有点类似，都是在一次排序后把最小的元素放到最前面。但是过程不同，冒泡排序是通过相邻的比较和交换。而选择排序是通过对整体的选择。举个栗子，对</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">5,3,8,6,4</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">这个无序序列进行简单选择排序，首先要选择</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">5</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">以外的最小数来和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">5</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">交换，也就是选择</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">3</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">5</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">交换，一次排序后就变成了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">3,5,8,6,4.</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">对剩下的序列一次进行选择和交换，最终就会得到一个有序序列。其实选择排序可以看成冒泡排序的优化，因为其目的相同，只是选择排序只有在确定了最小数的前提下才进行交换，大大减少了交换的次数。选择排序的时间复杂度为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">O(n^2)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><strong><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">实现代码：</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E;
mso-no-proof:yes"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="图片_x0020_37" o:spid="_x0000_i1055"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:640pt;height:564pt;visibility:visible;
 mso-wrap-style:square'>
 <v:imagedata src="file:////Users/zhaofeng/Library/Group%20Containers/UBF8T346G9.Office/msoclip1/01/clip_image002.png"
  o:title=""/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><!--[if !vml]--><img width="640" height="564" src="quiver-image-url/B788C671CC2C47DCE0345149E0A6AE88.png" v:shapes="图片_x0020_37"><!--[endif]--></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><strong><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#AB1942">插入排序</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">插入排序不是通过交换位置而是通过比较找到合适的位置插入元素来达到排序的目的的。相信大家都有过打扑克牌的经历，特别是牌数较大的。在分牌时可能要整理自己的牌，牌多的时候怎么整理呢？就是拿到一张牌，找到一个合适的位置插入。这个原理其实和插入排序是一样的。举个栗子，对</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">5,3,8,6,4</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">这个无序序列进行简单插入排序，首先假设第一个数的位置时正确的，想一下在拿到第一张牌的时候，没必要整理。然后</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">3</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">要插到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">5</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">前面，把</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">5</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">后移一位，变成</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">3,5,8,6,4.</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">想一下整理牌的时候应该也是这样吧。然后</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">8</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">不用动，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">6</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><strong><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#AB1942">快速排序</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">快速排序一听名字就觉得很高端，在实际应用当中快速排序确实也是表现最好的排序算法。快速排序虽然高端，但其实其思想是来自冒泡排序，冒泡排序是通过相邻元素的比较和交换把最小的冒泡到最顶端，而快速排序是比较和交换小数和大数，这样一来不仅把小数冒泡到上面同时也把大数沉到下面。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">举个栗子：对</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">5,3,8,6,4</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">这个无序序列进行快速排序，思路是右指针找比基准数小的，左指针找比基准数大的，交换之。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">5,3,8,6,4
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:

mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">比</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;

mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:

18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">4</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">时两指针相遇。停止。然后交换</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">4</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">4,3,5,6,8
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">一次划分后达到了左边比</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">5</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">小，右边比</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">5</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">大的目的。之后对左右子序列递归排序，最终得到有序序列。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">上面留下来了一个问题为什么一定要</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">j</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">指针先动呢？首先这也不是绝对的，这取决于基准数的位置，因为在最后两个指针相遇的时候，要交换基准数到相遇的位置。一般选取第一个数作为基准数，那么就是在左边，所以最后相遇的数要和基准数交换，那么相遇的数一定要比基准数小。所以</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">j</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">指针先移动才能先找到比基准数小的数。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">快速排序是不稳定的，其时间平均时间复杂度是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">O(nlgn)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">实现代码：</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">了，所以不需要每次交换都设置一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">temp</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">变量，在交换左右指针的时候只需要先后覆盖就可以了。这样既能减少空间的使用还能降低赋值运算的次数。优化</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">总结快速排序的思想：冒泡</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">+</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">二分</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">+</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">递归分治，慢慢体会。。。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><strong><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#AB1942">堆排序</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">堆排序是借助堆来实现的选择排序，思想同简单的选择排序，以下以大顶堆为例。注意：如果想升序排序就使用大顶堆，反之使用小顶堆。原因是堆顶元素需要交换到序列尾部。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><strong><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">首先，实现堆排序需要解决两个问题：</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">1</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">、如何由一个无序序列键成一个堆？</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">2</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">、如何在输出堆顶元素之后，调整剩余元素成为一个新的堆？</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">第一个问题，可以直接使用线性数组来表示一个堆，由初始的无序序列建成一个堆就需要自底向上从第一个非叶元素开始挨个调整成一个堆。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">第二个问题，怎么调整成堆？首先是将堆顶元素和最后一个元素交换。然后比较当前堆顶元素的左右孩子节点，因为除了当前的堆顶元素，左右孩子堆均满足条件，这时需要选择当前堆顶元素与左右孩子节点的较大者（大顶堆）交换，直至叶子节点。我们称这个自堆顶自叶子的调整成为筛选。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">从一个无序序列建堆的过程就是一个反复筛选的过程。若将此序列看成是一个完全二叉树，则最后一个非终端节点是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">n/2</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">取底个元素，由此筛选即可。举个栗子：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">49,38,65,97,76,13,27,49</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">序列的堆排序建初始堆和调整的过程如下：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><strong><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#AB1942">希尔排序</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">希尔排序是插入排序的一种高效率的实现，也叫缩小增量排序。简单的插入排序中，如果待排序列是正序时，时间复杂度是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">O(n)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，如果序列是基本有序的，使用直接插入排序效率就非常高。希尔排序就利用了这个特点。基本思想是：先将整个待排记录序列分割成为若干子序列分别进行直接插入排序，待整个序列中的记录基本有序时再对全体记录进行一次直接插入排序。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><strong><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">举个栗子：</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">从上述排序过程可见，希尔排序的特点是，子序列的构成不是简单的逐段分割，而是将某个相隔某个增量的记录组成一个子序列。如上面的例子，第一堂排序时的增量为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">5</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，第二趟排序的增量为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">3</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。由于前两趟的插入排序中记录的关键字是和同一子序列中的前一个记录的关键字进行比较，因此关键字较小的记录就不是一步一步地向前挪动，而是跳跃式地往前移，从而使得进行最后一趟排序时，整个序列已经做到基本有序，只要作记录的少量比较和移动即可。因此希尔排序的效率要比直接插入排序高。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">希尔排序的分析是复杂的，时间复杂度是所取增量的函数，这涉及一些数学上的难题。但是在大量实验的基础上推出当</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">n</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">在某个范围内时，时间复杂度可以达到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">O(n^1.3)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">归并排序是另一种不同的排序方法，因为归并排序使用了递归分治的思想，所以理解起来比较容易。其基本思想是，先递归划分子问题，然后合并结果。把待排序列看成由两个有序的子序列，然后合并两个子序列，然后把子序列看成由两个有序序列。。。。。倒着来看，其实就是先两两合并，然后四四合并。。。最终形成有序序列。空间复杂度为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">O(n)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，时间复杂度为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">O(nlogn)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">桶排序利用函数的映射关系，减少了几乎所有的比较工作。实际上，桶排序的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">值的计算，其作用就相当于快排中划分，希尔排序中的子序列，归并排序中的子问题，已经把大量数据分割成了基本有序的数据块</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。然后只需要对桶中的少量数据做先进的比较排序即可。　</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>

</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

color:#3E3E3E">O(N)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">(2)
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">利用先进的比较排序算法对每个桶内的所有数据进行排序，其时间复杂度为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">  ∑ O(Ni*logNi) </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">。其中</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">Ni </span><span style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">为第</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">i</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">个桶的数据量。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">很显然，第</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">(2)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">部分是桶排序性能好坏的决定因素。尽量减少桶内数据的数量是提高效率的唯一办法</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">(</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">因为基于比较排序的最好平均时间复杂度只能达到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">O(N*logN)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。因此，我们需要尽量做到下面两点：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">(1)
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">映射函数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">f(k)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">能够将</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">N</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">个数据平均的分配到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">M</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">个桶中，这样每个桶就有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">[N/M]</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">个数据量。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">(2)
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">尽量的增大桶的数量。极限情况下每个桶只能得到一个数据，这样就完全避开了桶内数据的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">“</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">比较</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">”</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">排序操作。当然，做到这一点很不容易，数据量巨大的情况下，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">f(k)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">函数会使得桶集合的数量巨大，空间浪费严重。这就是一个时间代价和空间代价的权衡问题了。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">对于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">N</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">个待排数据，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">M</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">个桶，平均每个桶</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">[N/M]</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">个数据的桶排序平均时间复杂度为：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">O(N)+O(M*(N/M)*log(N/M))=O(N+N*(logN-logM))=O(N+N*logN-N*logM)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">当</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">N=M</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">时，即极限情况下每个桶只有一个数据时。桶排序的最好效率能够达到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">O(N)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><strong><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">总结：</span></strong><strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> </span></strong><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">桶排序的平均时间复杂度为线性的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">O(N+C)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，其中</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">C=N*(logN-logM)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。如果相对于同样的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">N</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，桶数量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">M</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">越大，其效率越高，最好的时间复杂度达到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">O(N)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">当然桶排序的空间复杂度</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">O(N+M)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，如果输入数据非常庞大，而桶的数量也非常多，则空间代价无疑是昂贵的。此外，桶排序是稳定的。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">基数排序又是一种和前面排序方式不同的排序方式，基数排序不需要进行记录关键字之间的比较。基数排序是一种借助多关键字排序思想对单逻辑关键字进行排序的方法。所谓的多关键字排序就是有多个优先级不同的关键字。比如说成绩的排序，如果两个人总分相同，则语文高的排在前面，语文成绩也相同则数学高的排在前面。。。如果对数字进行排序，那么个位、十位、百位就是不同优先级的关键字，如果要进行升序排序，那么个位、十位、百位优先级一次增加。基数排序是通过多次的收分配和收集来实现的，关键字优先级低的先进行分配和收集。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> 
      int max = Integer.MIN_VALUE;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> 
      for(int ele : arr) {<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> 
          int len = (ele+"").length();<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> 
          if(len > max)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> 
              max = len;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> 
      }<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> 
      return max;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> 
  }<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">

color:#3E3E3E">0.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">

  public static int getNBit(int x, int n) {<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> 
      String sx = x + "";<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> 
      if(sx.length() < n)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> 
          return sx.charAt(sx.length()-n) - '0';<o:p></o:p></span></p>

"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">在前面的介绍和分析中我们提到了冒泡排序、选择排序、插入排序三种简单的排序及其变种快速排序、堆排序、希尔排序三种比较高效的排序。后面我们又分析了基于分治递归思想的归并排序还有计数排序、桶排序、基数排序三种线性排序。我们可以知道排序算法要么简单有效，要么是利用简单排序的特点加以改进，要么是以空间换取时间在特定情况下的高效排序。但是这些排序方法都不是固定不变的，需要结合具体的需求和场景来选择甚至组合使用。才能达到高效稳定的目的。没有最好的排序，只有最适合的排序。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

 height:24.35pt'>
 <v:imagedata croptop="-65520f" cropbottom="65520f"/>
</v:shape><span style='mso-element:field-end'></span></span><![endif]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">1</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">、从平均时间来看，快速排序是效率最高的，但快速排序在最坏情况下的时间性能不如堆排序和归并排序。而后者相比较的结果是，在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">n</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">较大时归并排序使用时间较少，但使用辅助空间较多。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">2</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">、上面说的简单排序包括除希尔排序之外的所有冒泡排序、插入排序、简单选择排序。其中直接插入排序最简单，但序列基本有序或者</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">n</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">较小时，直接插入排序是好的方法，因此常将它和其他的排序方法，如快速排序、归并排序等结合在一起使用。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">3</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">、基数排序的时间复杂度也可以写成</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">O(d*n)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。因此它最使用于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">n</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">值很大而关键字较小的的序列。若关键字也很大，而序列中大多数记录的最高关键字均不同，则亦可先按最高关键字不同，将序列分成若干小的子序列，而后进行直接插入排序。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">4</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">、从方法的稳定性来比较，基数排序是稳定的内排方法，所有时间复杂度为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">O(n^2)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的简单排序也是稳定的。但是快速排序、堆排序、希尔排序等时间性能较好的排序方法都是不稳定的。稳定性需要根据具体需求选择。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">5</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">、上面的算法实现大多数是使用线性存储结构，像插入排序这种算法用链表实现更好，省去了移动元素的时间。具体的存储结构在具体的实现版本中也是不同的。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><strong><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">附：基于比较排序算法时间下限为</span></strong><strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">O(nlogn)</span></strong><strong><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
color:#3E3E3E">的证明：</span></strong><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">基于比较排序下限的证明是通过决策树证明的，决策树的高度</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">Ω</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">nlgn</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">），这样就得出了比较排序的下限。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"><br>

<p style="margin:0cm;margin-bottom:.0001pt;background:white"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">首先要引入决策树。</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">首先决策树是一颗二叉树，每个节点表示元素之间一组可能的排序，它予以京进行的比较相一致，比较的结果是树的边。</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">先来说明一些二叉树的性质，令</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">T</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">是深度为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">d</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">的二叉树，则</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">T</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">最多有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">2^</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">片树叶。</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">具有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">L</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">片树叶的二叉树的深度至少是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">logL</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">所以，对</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">n</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">个元素排序的决策树必然有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">n!</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">片树叶（因为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">n</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">个数有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">n!</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">种不同的大小关系），所以决策树的深度至少是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">log(n!)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">，即至少需要</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">log(n!)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">次比较。</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">而</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;color:#3E3E3E">
log(n!)=logn+log(n-1)+log(n-2)+...+log2+log1
>=logn+log(n-1)+log(n-2)+...+log(n/2) >=(n/2)log(n/2) >=(n/2)logn-n/2
=O(nlogn) </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">所以只用到比较的排序算法最低时间复杂度是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E">O(nlogn)</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";color:#3E3E3E">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
color:#3E3E3E"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>
